markdown:
Let me start off with I like Smosh and their content; but I really dislike their Reddit Stories section. Apparently a lot of people like it, but to me the idea is so cheap, just reading someone else's work.. doesn't help that I think at least 50% of Reddit stories are made up to begin with.

Next to this pet peeve, there's now V-Tubers who are just regurgitating viral content with bouncy avatars.
